---
title: "Lab News" 
---

```{r news_render, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
news <- read.csv("data/news.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
news$date <- as.Date(paste0(news$date, "-01"))
news <- news[order(news$date, decreasing = TRUE), ]
news$label <- format(news$date, "%B %Y")

for (label in unique(news$label)) {
  cat(sprintf("### %s\n\n", label))
  subset <- news[news$label == label, ]
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(subset))) {
    cat(sprintf("- %s\n", subset$item[i]))
  }
  cat("\n")
}
```
